description: The 3D Poses in the Wild dataset is the first dataset captured in the wild with accurate 3D poses for evaluation. Unlike other outdoor datasets, which are restricted to a small recording volume, 3DPW includes video footage from a moving phone camera, enabling broader scenarios.

annotations.2D_pose: 2D pose annotations for each video sequence.
annotations.3D_pose: 3D poses obtained using a method that leverages video and IMU data, achieving high accuracy in complex scenes.

data_content.camera_poses: Camera poses provided for every frame in the video sequences.
data_content.body_scans: 3D body scans and models (re-poseable and re-shapeable) corresponding to each video sequence.

3D_models.clothing_variations: Models are available in different clothing variations.

publication.title: Recovering Accurate 3D Human Pose in The Wild Using IMUs and a Moving Camera
